tasks.label: Executar Electron (Dev)
tasks.command: if [ ! -d 'node_modules' ]; then echo 'Instalando dependências...' && npm install; fi && npm start

windows.command: if (!(Test-Path 'node_modules')) { Write-Host 'Instalando dependências...'; npm install } npm start

tasks.label: Limpar e Gerar Executável
tasks.command: rm -rf out && if [[ "$OSTYPE" == "darwin"* ]]; then npm run make -- --platform=darwin --arch=x64,arm64; else npm run make; fi

windows.command: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command Remove-Item -Path 'out' -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; npm run make
